channel.title: Hi! I'm Bryce - Digital Nomad & WordPress Developer
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
I'm [**Bryce**][1]. I'm a WordPress developer, living in Bangkok at the moment but constantly on the road working out of my backpack. I work for **WooThemes** - we build the open-source ecommerce software **WooCommerce**.
I also work on a lot of other WordPress-related projects, mostly open source plugins (you can find them through my twitter profile linked to above).
I'm currently bootstrapping my first (non-WordPress) product - [**Nomad SMS**][2] - which is scary but exciting. It's only been a week, but it's a fun week.
**Looking forward to chatting with you all!**
[1]: http://twitter.com/bryceadams [2]: http://nomadsms.com

item.title: Hi! I'm Bryce - Digital Nomad & WordPress Developer
item.dc:creator: bryce
item.description:
Hi everyone!

I’m Bryce. I’m a WordPress developer, living in Bangkok at the moment but constantly on the road working out of my backpack. I work for WooThemes - we build the open-source ecommerce software WooCommerce.

I also work on a lot of other WordPress-related projects, mostly open source plugins (you can find them through my twitter profile linked to above).

I’m currently bootstrapping my first (non-WordPress) product - Nomad SMS - which is scary but exciting. It’s only been a week, but it’s a fun week.

Looking forward to chatting with you all!
